Manx: The following is a copy of the menu of the Hall Caine banquet as printed in English and Manx :—

English: 3 Eeast Feer Vlastel[1].  Aulyn Blaystall[2] Hollandaise.
Notes:
[1] Vlastel] Vlastal
[2] Aulyn Blaystall] Aunlyn Blastal

English: 4 Feill Vart Gavit: Aulyn Blastall[3] Bernaise.

Notes: [4] Kellagh Ny Kaigh-Sayagh — this is almost certainly taken erroneously from J. Kelly’s dictionary which gives for ‘turkey’; Kellagh ny Kiark rangagh, which, word-for-word, means; ‘a male or female French hen’.
